li.label: ate human meat-paste
li.description: Not only did I consume nutrient-paste from a tube, but it was made from human meat. People. Were they my friend who died, or that prisoner we executed? I wish the gear-oil hid the...other taste more.

li.label: nutrient-paste cannibalism
li.description: I consumed nutrient-paste made from another human. If only I could have cooked it myself instead of letting this machine prepare it!

li.description: Not only did I consume a crumbly, burnt nutrient-brick, but it was made from human meat. People. Were they my friend who died, or that prisoner we executed? I wish the gear-oil and burnt flavor hid the...other taste more.
